title: Day 7: Winner Winner, Nathan Chen's Chicken Dinner
description:
Nathan Chen has secured his Olympic gold. The newly crowned king of figure skating, courtesy of a 7:15 pm bedtime, tells us about his performance and how he pigged out on KFC, Pizza Hut and ice cream to celebrate.

Follow In The Village on Apple Podcasts for an inside look at the athlete life in Beijing, and watch all the Olympic action unfold on the networks of NBC
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Olympics)
